history.proof: intros p q a Hcanon_p Hcanon_paq. unfold canonical in Hcanon_p, Hcanon_paq. unfold pX in Hcanon_paq. shelve.

ctx: intros p q a Hcanon_p Hcanon_paq.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables eqA_dec, n, ltM, ltM_dec, p, q, a.

ctx: intros p q a Hcanon_p Hcanon_paq.
exceptions.tactic: apply eqP_trans with (pluspf A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec ltM ltM_dec (mults multA a p) (multpf p q)).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) p, q : list (Term A n) a : Term A n Hcanon_p : olist (A:=A) ltM p /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) p Hcanon_paq : olist (A:=A) ltM (a :: q) /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (a :: q) The term "eqA" has type "A -> A -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "A -> A -> A" (cannot unify "Prop" and "A").

ctx: intros p q a Hcanon_p Hcanon_paq.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables A1, plusA, invA, minusA, multA, divA, eqA_dec, ltM_dec, p, a.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (p q : list (Term A n)) (a : Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a q) -> eqP A eqA n (multpf p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a q)) (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a p) (multpf p q))

Premises:

canonical : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop

canonical_pluspf : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall l1 l2 : list (Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM l1 -> canonical A0 eqA ltM l2 -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec l1 l2)
plusP_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), (forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) -> OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall p q r s : list (Term A n), plusP A A0 eqA plusA n ltM p q r ->...-> eqP A eqA n r s
pO_pluspf_inv1 : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall p : list (Term A n), p = pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (pO A n) p
pO_pluspf_inv2 : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall p : list (Term A n), p = pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec p (pO A n)
multlm_comp_canonical : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) b a) (mults multA (n:=n) b p))
pluspf_is_plusP : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) (l1 l2 : list (Term A n)), plusP A A0 eqA plusA n ltM l1 l2 (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec l1 l2)
ltP_pX_canonical : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ltP (A:=A) ltM p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n)) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)
eqp_imp_canonical : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqP A eqA n p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q
plusp : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), (forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) -> forall l : list (Term A n) * list (Term A n), {a : list (Term A n) | plusP A A0 eqA plusA n ltM (fst l) (snd l) a}
mults_order_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) m1 m2) (mults multA (n:=n) m1 l))
splus : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (A -> A -> A) -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), (forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) -> OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> poly A0 eqA ltM -> poly A0 eqA ltM -> poly A0 eqA ltM

```coq
intros p q a Hcanon_p Hcanon_paq.
unfold canonical in Hcanon_p, Hcanon_paq.
unfold pX in Hcanon_paq.
apply eqP_trans with (multpf p (pX a q)).
- apply mults_dist_pluspf with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (multA:=multA) (divA:=divA) in cs.
  apply eqP_symm in Hcanon_paq.
  apply eqP_trans with (pluspf A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec ltM ltM_dec (mults multA a p) (multpf p q)).
  + apply mults_dist_pluspf in Hcanon_paq; assumption.
  + apply eqP_symm, pluspf_com with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (multA:=multA) (divA:=divA) in cs; auto.
- apply eqP_symm, multpf_eqp with (A:=A) (n:=n); assumption.
```

original: intros p q a Hcanon_p Hcanon_paq. unfold canonical in Hcanon_p, Hcanon_paq. unfold pX in Hcanon_paq. apply eqP_trans with (multpf p (pX a q)). - apply mults_dist_pluspf with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (multA:=multA) (divA:=divA) in cs. apply eqP_symm in Hcanon_paq. apply eqP_trans with (pluspf A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec ltM ltM_dec (mults multA a p) (multpf p q)). + apply mults_dist_pluspf in Hcanon_paq; auto. + apply eqP_symm, pluspf_com with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (multA:=multA) (divA:=divA) in cs; auto. - apply eqP_symm, multpf_eqp with (A:=A) (n:=n); auto.
